WRITING.TEXT:
The worst thing about Farage is that he knows exactly what effect comments like this have: they stir up his knuckle-dragging supporters with their whole "well, he's right ain't he" bilge, and make out as if any right-thinking person who believes in a more nuanced view of the world is some kind of "liberal elite", blissfully detached from reality.
In short, Farage revels in division. The more divided society is, the more that pond life like him will prosper.

WRITING.TITLE: Edikanfo - Gbenta [Funk] African super band produced by Brian Eno

WRITING.TEXT:
I'm almost most excited about the music. This is what Jhann Jhannsson has said about it:
Ive been recording here and there for the Blade Runner film since July. Theyre slowly starting to send me some scenes, its a project with a lot of secrecy around it, but Im slowly finding the voice of the film." ([source](https://inews.co.uk/essentials/culture/music/johann-johannsson-blade-runner-arrival-sicario/))

WRITING.TEXT: For places that look like they've not changed in 50 years: Oxford Bar, Diggers, Jolly Judge, Nobles, Barony or Blue Blazer. If I'm after a livelier pub with good drinks options, I like The Fountain, Hanging Bat or Red Squirrel.
